plot outline: Minchina Ota is a 2008 Indian Kannada movie directed by A M R Ramesh and produced by Sa Ra Govindu. The film stars Vijaya Raghavendra, Murali, Lakshmi Rai, Rahul Roy, Rangayana Raghu in lead roles. The film had musical score by V Manohar. Watch the full movie, Minchina Ota, online, only on Eros Now.
